Description: Path to directory containing executed Phase A Common Components (cca) associated with this ETL

Notes.1: Request ID should be included in path name
Notes.2: Data Partners who do not have Common Components output related to their Phase A ETL should leave this blank and populate parameters specified in Table \@ref(tab:file2010-master-program-optional).

Description: Project identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking
Work plan type for internal SOC identification and tracking.

Notes.1: This value is used to conditionally select the appropriate inputfiles for the distributed database type.

Valid Values: qmr: Used for package distributions aimed at Sentinel Distributed Database Data Partners
qcm: Used for package distributions aimed at Rapid COVID Distributed Database Data Partners
qmd: Used for beta test packages

Description: Work plan identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking.

Notes.2: Should be used to uniquely identify packages distributed against given ETL

Description: Data Partner identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking.
Version identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking. Should track each re-distribution of the package (if multiple distributions are required).

Notes.1: : This needs to be the same ETL number for Phase A
